nodes.text: Thage Howless was the husband of Gorgeous Su, a soldier in the New Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry. At some point by the Galactic Civil War, the pair became separated. Around 5 ABY, Su, while deployed on the planet Troithe, played Who? What? Where?—a game in which each participant explained out who they wanted to be informed first of their death, their cause of death, and where it would happen— with the other members of a squadron of Sixty-First soldiers with partial flight experience which she had joined. During this game, Su chose Howless to be the first to know about her death, considering her husband to have a black heart.
Thage Howless was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, the second installment of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy which was written by Alexander Freed.
